com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars

Class AbstractTerritoryView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.AbstractTerritoryView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GridTextTerritoryView

    public abstract class AbstractTerritoryView
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jack Mueller on 2/25/15. This class is the superclass for a game Territory, which is updated with data from the model to display Territory * information to the users. It programmatically generates the Android View it needs to represent itself, rather than having it defined through XML.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultView

        public abstract View defaultView(Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - The MainGameActivity this territory will be used in, needed for creating Views.
        Returns:
        A View that can display color and value information, and that will combine nicely with other Views to represent a BoardView.
